categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: A lightweight pump and waterproof compression bag in one. The Schnozzel Pumpbag is the right tool to keep your Exped Mat dry in transit and to quickly inflate everyone's sleeping mats in just 2-3 compressions.Made of 20-denier ripstop nylon, that's silicone and polyurethane coated.Bottom uses polyester that has an embossed (non-slippery) TPU film designed to resist breaking down when exposed to water.Compatible with 20mm valves on Exped Mats.Volume is 42L. Packed volume is 0.2L.Dimensions are 69 x 39 x 17cm.
name: Exped Schnozzel Ultralight Pumpbag
